text: The Karate Kid is a 1984 film. Karate Kid may also refer to: ==The Karate Kid franchise== *The Karate Kid Part II, the 1986 sequel *The Karate Kid Part III, the 1989 sequel to the 1986 film *The Next Karate Kid, the 1994 sequel to the 1989 film *The Karate Kid (video game), based on the first two films *The Karate Kid (TV series), a 1989 animated TV series based on the first three films *The Karate Kid (2010 film), a remake of the 1984 film *Cobra Kai: The Karate Kid Saga Continues, a 2018 TV series that continues the plot of the original movie ==Other== *Karate Kid (comics), a fictional superhero *Karate Kids U.S.A., a 1980 children's martial arts film ==See also== *Kung fu kid (disambiguation)
title: Karate Kid (disambiguation)
